segments.text: Good morning . What can I do for you , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . I'd like to have a haircut .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very well . Please sit down here . Do you want me to cut your hair very close ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please cut the sides shorter , but not so much at the back .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's such a hot season , isn't it ? May I suggest thinning out the top ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a good idea . But leave the front as it is now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ( several minutes later ) Now it's done . Is it satisfactory ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Anything else I can do for you , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1
